There are many different accommodation options in Yamba. The only backpackers in Yamba is a YHA. Their website is:http://www3.yha.com.au/hostels/nsw/backpackers-hostels-near-byron-bay/yamba/. It is located in Coldstream st. There is a greyhound bus stop just down the road. There is a licensed cafe downstairs.
Yamba, on mid-north coast NSW, is a great stop off between Sydney and Brisbane. This beachside town has one of Australia's most famous surf breaks. Yamba YHA is a purpose-built backpacker hostel with a mix of multi-share and twin/double accommodation. Enjoy the bar/caf√© and pool with great views. The hostel is on the main street, within easy walk of beaches, local pub and shops. Don't miss Shane's famous $10 tour.

Great place to stay. Nice place to have a beer, and a milkshake.
